data.name: Famous-ish
data.detailed_description:
It all seemed like just a normal day, that is until you saw that cat in the road, or more precisely the woman trying to shoo the cat to safety, oblivious to the danger she was in herself. You only had a moment to think but your body reacted without thinking pushing her out of the way of the oncoming traffice.

Now your life is one crazy event after the other after in turns out the woman you saved is a Princess!

How will you find life as a Famous-ish person and apparent Hero.

Features

  • A multi-route story-line where your choices affect the events.
  • Multiple different endings and outcomes based on your decisions.
  • A fun tongue in cheek story-line with multiple characters.
  • Cute and Sexy, High quality illustrations.
data.about_the_game:
It all seemed like just a normal day, that is until you saw that cat in the road, or more precisely the woman trying to shoo the cat to safety, oblivious to the danger she was in herself. You only had a moment to think but your body reacted without thinking pushing her out of the way of the oncoming traffice.

data.short_description: A fun tongue in cheek story about a down at the heels young man whose life is turned upside down when he saves a young womans life who turns out to be a Princess. How will he feel suddenly being Famous-ish.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
